sub_title: Senior researcher at Wageningen Economic Research
summary:
Development economist with broad interest and working experience in Asia (Indonesia, Vietnam), Latin America (Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Uruguay, Venezuela) and Africa (Burkina Faso, Ghana, Mali, Nigeria, Senegal).

Specialties: Technical change, industrial and trade policy, growth, taxation, public finance, agriculture, civil society and corporate social responsibility. Focus on applied empirical research using qualitative and quantitative (econometrics) approaches.
